entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:18 p.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -8.5Â°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:40 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:40 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
